title: Textile, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
inscribed:
'La laitiere et le pot au lait' (the milkmaid and the jug of milk),
'Les deux mulets' (the two mules)
'L'abreuvoir de village' (the village well)
'Le meunier,son fils et l'ane' (the miller, his son and a donkey)
and 'Buquet sclpt.' under the last scene.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 50 x 79 cm (19 11/16 x 31 1/8 in.); the fabric is selvedge to selvedge.
description: Four scenes, titled in French, illustrating four of la Fontaine's fables. In sepia on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-156.
